EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification of Application {!Application__c.Name} assignment
This email is to inform you that the Application {!Application__c.Name} has been assigned to you for review and approval.
{!User.Profile} comments: {!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
To access the task and take relevant action, click the following link: {!Application__c.Link}
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} at {!User.Email}.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
